item.title: #en @ 1522586917744910336
item.description:
Open data can make research more publicly accessible and accountable - often associated w quant datasets.
It can be trickier to make qual datasets publicly available (risks to participant privacy, etc).
We've been experimenting w an open data QUAL project @redetranscanada:

item.description:

item.title: #en @ 1522337046265798656
item.description:
I assigned my students to go to Psych Science (last 3 years) and pick a study with open data. Then run the authors' analyses and see if they can reproduce them.
Everyone seemed to enjoy it! Most cases everything was fine would recommend for other methods classes!
2 issues: 1/2
